name: Scandal in the Spotlight
storyline:
Japan's hottest boy band!
Five members perform, but the sixth--the lyricist--never shows his face.
However, his sudden disappearance has forced YOU to take his place!

"We're not letting you go, Little Miss Ghostwriter."

You're about to embark on a life of deception and glamour alongside national pop stars!

You signed a contract with them, and now you're living together with everyone?!
Not only that, but you have to act as their manager to keep up the facade...
He's got you at his beck and call 24/7!
But you find yourself oddly drawn to the man behind the persona...
summary: The ultimate long-running boy band, Revance. One night you attend their after-concert party and receive a mysterious invitation from the guys in the band! They drop a bombshell! Their lyricist has gone missing and they want you to fill in. You start a new life with these singers... and begin the deception of millions of fans.
